name: check_leap_year
description: Create a Scratch program that checks if a given year (positive integer) is a leap year. The sprite should say 'True' if it is, and 'False' otherwise.
instruction: Complete the given Scratch starter project that checks if a given year (positive integer) is a leap year. The sprite should say 'True' if it is, and 'False' otherwise.

evaluation.description: Tests if the sprite correctly executes the task: check_leap_year
